data.name: PSVersionTableDescription
data.value: Version information for current Windows PowerShell session.

data.name: DebugPreferenceDescription
data.value: Dictates action taken when an Debug message is delivered.

data.name: PSHostDescription
data.value: This is a reference to the host of this Runspace.

data.name: ProgressPreferenceDescription
data.value: Dictates action taken when Progress Records are delivered.

data.name: DollarPSCultureDescription
data.value: Culture of the current Windows PowerShell Session.

data.name: WhatIfPreferenceDescription
data.value: If true, WhatIf is considered to be enabled for all commands.

data.name: ConfirmPreferenceDescription
data.value: Dictates when confirmation should be requested. Confirmation is requested when the ConfirmImpact of the operation is equal to or greater than $ConfirmPreference. If $ConfirmPreference is None, actions will only be confirmed when Confirm is specified.

data.name: PSHOMEDescription
data.value: Parent folder of the host application of this Runspace.

data.name: ErrorActionPreferenceDescription
data.value: Dictates action taken when an error message is delivered.

data.name: HOMEDescription
data.value: Folder containing the current user's profile.

data.name: ReportErrorShowSourceDescription
data.value: Causes errors to be displayed with the source of the error.

data.name: PIDDescription
data.value: Current process ID.

data.name: DollarHookDescription
data.value: Execution status of last command.

data.name: MshShellIdDescription
data.value: The ShellID identifies the current shell. This is used by #Requires.

data.name: ErrorViewDescription
data.value: Dictates the view mode to use when displaying errors.

data.name: ReportErrorShowExceptionClassDescription
data.value: Causes errors to be displayed with a description of the error class.

data.name: ReportErrorShowStackTraceDescription
data.value: Causes errors to be displayed with a stack trace.

data.name: DollarPSUICultureDescription
data.value: UI Culture of the current Windows PowerShell Session.

data.name: ExecutionContextDescription
data.value: The execution objects available to cmdlets.

data.name: NestedPromptLevelDescription
data.value: Dictates what type of prompt should be displayed for the current nesting level.

data.name: PSDefaultParameterValuesDescription
data.value: Variable to hold all default <cmdlet:parameter, value> pairs.

data.name: ReportErrorShowInnerExceptionDescription
data.value: Causes errors to be displayed with the inner exceptions.

data.name: OutputEncodingDescription
data.value: The text encoding used when piping text to a native executable.

data.name: PPIDDescription
data.value: Parent process ID.

data.name: VerbosePreferenceDescription
data.value: Dictates the action taken when a Verbose message is delivered.

data.name: PSEmailServerDescription
data.value: Variable to hold the Email Server. This can be used instead of HostName parameter in Send-MailMessage cmdlet.

data.name: ConsoleDescription
data.value: Name of the current console file.

data.name: PauseDefinitionString
data.value: Press Enter to continue...

data.name: FormatEnunmerationLimitDescription
data.value: Dictates the limit of enumeration on formatting IEnumerable objects.

data.name: WarningPreferenceDescription
data.value: Dictates the action taken when a Warning message is delivered.
